content: this legal case involved a dispute between pp gp their brother pap and sisterinlaw ls regarding the inheritance of an apartment in albenga the plaintiffs claimed that they were harmed and demanded a declaration of harmfulness division of the property restitution of money and valuables and dissolution of the community inheritance the defendants argued against the claims and requested the plaintiffs to pay for inheritance expenses after several years of proceedings the court in savona made a final ruling the court rejected some claims found some to be unfounded and granted others it determined the value of the real estate properties and the rightful share of the parties involved the court also identified additional properties and assigned them to the heirs costs of the proceedings were offset and one party was ordered to pay certain costs the court referred to specific articles of the civil code in making its decision the judgment is provisionally enforceable
